description: Gigabyte GA-H81M-DS2 Micro ATX ultra durable motherboard has the compatibility with 4th gen Intel processors. This board also supports dual channel DDR3 maximum 16GB memory and dual Ultra-Fast SATA interface. Focusing on the graphics, it has integrated Intel HD graphics with 1GB shared graphics memory containing the resolution of 1920x1200 Hz for D-Sub port. This basic motherboard has the facility of GIGABYTE On/Off Chargeâ„¢ for USB devices, LAN with high ESD Protection and USB 3.0 ports with GIGABYTE 3x USB power. name: BIOSTAR H610MH 12th and 13th Gen Micro ATX Motherboard
description: The BIOSTAR H610MH is a micro ATX motherboard that supports the latest 12th and 13th gen Intel Core processors. It is equipped with an Intel H610 single-chip architecture, which provides a solid foundation for high-performance computing. With support for 2-DIMM DDR4 memory, the H610MH can handle up to 64 GB of memory, allowing for smooth multitasking and high-speed data transfer. The motherboard also supports PCIe 4.0 and PCIe M.2 3.0 (32Gb/s) which provides lightning-fast data transfer speeds and smooth gaming experiences. PCIe 4.0 is the next evolution of the ubiquitous and general-purpose PCI Express I/O standard. At 16GT/s bit rate, the interconnect performance bandwidth is doubled over PCIe 3.0, while preserving compatibility with software and mechanical interfaces. The H610MH also supports HDMI 4K2K and USB 3.2 Gen1, allowing for high-definition video output and fast data transfer. The onboard HDMI connector allows full video & audio support. It has industry-leading high-definition video quality. This motherboard is ideal for gamers, content creators, and power users who demand the best performance from their systems.

features.name: Supported CPU

name: Asus Rog Crosshair X570 VIII Formula AMD ATX Gaming Motherboard
description: ROG Crosshair VIII Formula comes equipped with an optimized power-design layout to handle the prodigious power of the latest AMD Ryzen processors without throttling.â€‹ ROG gives you powerful tools that make optimizing your system fast and easy. For those who relish fine-grained control, the UEFI BIOS has a wealth of advanced options organized into intuitive categories that provide the ability to tweak every aspect of your systemâ€‹. ROG Crosshair VIII Formula offers advanced connectivity to ensure seamless gaming experiences. With the latest ultrafast networking, including Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) and dual Ethernet with one 5G port, ROG Crosshair VIII Formula removes all bottlenecks for online and LAN play, minimizing lag and providing an overall smoother experience. Additionally, the M.2 supports AMD StoreMI technology to maximize the speed of your SSD for faster load times, and SupremeFX on-board audio provides superb sound, while saving a PCIe slot.â€‹ THE POWER TO PERSONALIZE ROG provides a range of intuitive software that enables easy control of your advanced gaming hardware and ensures seamless component compatibility. From RGB lighting, networking and audio to storage optimization and more, ROG gives you the power to personalize your system just the way you want.â€‹ The AMD X570 chipset delivers outstanding overclocking capabilities for the latest AMD AM4 socket for 3rd and 2nd Gen AMD Ryzenâ„¢ /2nd and 1st Gen AMD Ryzenâ„¢ with Radeonâ„¢ Vega Graphics Processors. It is optimized for multiple GPU configurations, including NVIDIA SLIÂ® and AMD CrossFireXâ„¢. It also supports x16 PCI ExpressÂ® 4.0/3.0 lanes and provides 10Gb/s USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports and 6 Gb/s SATA ports for faster data retrieval.â€‹ The high-performance 3rd Gen AMD Ryzenâ„¢ processors are based on the next-gen 7nm Zen architecture and support up to 16 processor cores. AMD AM4-socket processors feature dual-channel DDR4 memory, native 10Gb/s USB 3.2 Gen 2 and x16 PCI ExpressÂ® 4.0/3.0 lanes for superb performance.

reviews.detail: This motherboard is a beast! Overclocks like a champ.
Impressive build quality and excellent BIOS features.

name: MSI MPG Z790 CARBON WIFI 13th and 12th Gen ATX Motherboard
description: The MSI MPG Z790 CARBON WIFI Motherboard supports 13th /12th Gen Intel Core / Pentium / Celeron processors for LGA 1700 socket. This ATX motherboard, which uses the Intel Z790 chipset and the LGA 1700 socket, has four DDR4 RAM slots that allow twin-channel memory and speeds up to 7600+(OC) MHz. It comes with PCIe 5.0 slot, Lightning Gen 5 x4 M.2, USB 3.2 Gen 2x2. It also enables RAID 0, 1, 5, and 10 through SATA or 0, 1, and 5 via M.2. GPUs and other adaptor cards may be installed through PCIe 5.0 x16, PCIe 4.0 x16, PCIe 3.0 x16, and PCIe 3.0 x1 slots. It comes with an enlarged heatsink with a heat pipe, MOSFET thermal pads rated for 7W/mk, additional choke thermal pads, and M.2 Shield Frozr are built for a high-performance system and non-stop gaming experience. The MSI MPG Z790 CARBON WIFI Motherboard is equipped with 2.5 GbE Intel LAN and Wi-Fi 6E; quickly connects to wireless peripherals with Bluetooth 5.2. Upgraded network solution for professional and multimedia use. Delivers a secure, stable, and fast network connection. The Realtek ALC4080 audio codec offers 7.1 channel surround sound, and the rear ports can be used for analog or digital output. Connect connected peripherals through two USB 2.0, two USB 3.2 Gen 1, and three USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-A ports, or a USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C port. DisplayPort and HDMI are used to output video. A Flash BIOS button is also located on the rear I/O panel, and internal headers support front-panel USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C and USB 3.2 Gen 1 and 2.0 Type-A ports, RGB connections, chassis intrusion, a TPM module, and other features. The MSI MPG Z790 CARBON WIFI Motherboard comes with a 03-year warranty.

reviews.detail: Sleek design and runs all my games smoothly.
Easy to set up, and the RGB lighting is a nice touch.

name: Intel 10th Gen Core i3 10100F Processor
description: Intel 10th Generation Core i3-10100F Processor having the base frequency of 3.60 GHz that can be reached as max turbo frequency at 4.30 GHz. It has the L3 SmartCache of 6 MB containing 4 cores and 8 threads. With the bus speed of 8 GT/s DMI3, it has thermal design power (TDP) rating of 65W. This latest microchip has few expansion options such 3.0 PCI express revision having configured up to 1x16, 2x8, 1x8+2x4 and maximum 16 lanes. Considering the memory this processor has dual channel of max 128 GB of size that supports up to DDR4-2666 bus speed.

name: Intel Core i3-12100F 12th Gen Alder Lake Processor
description: The latest Intel 12th Gen Core i3-12100F Processor comes with 4 cores and 8 threads. It has a base frequency of 3.30 GHz and a maximum boost frequency of up to 4.30 GHz. The i3-12100F Alder Lake Processor comes with a 12 MB Intel Smart Cache and it has a 5 MB L2 cache. It features a Processor Base Power of 58W and a maximum turbo power of 89W. The Intel Core i3-12100F comes with 2 memory channels and it supports 128GB of maximum memory. The maximum bandwidth is 76.8 GB/s.

name: Intel 11th Gen Core i7-11700 Rocket Lake Processor
description: This Core i7-11700 Processor comes with Intel UHD Graphics 750. This new 11th gen Rocket Lake microarchitecture is manufactured with the 14nm process that comes with eight cores and 16 threads. These Processors also support 64-bit computing on Intel architecture requires an Intel x86-64 (64 bit) architecture-enabled BIOS. As this chip is updated to the latest BIOS revision, it nicely fits into any Intel 400 and 500 series motherboards. Focusing on this, all the major motherboard manufacturers have already started BIOS updates for their 400 and 500 series lineup.

name: Intel 10th Gen Core i7-10700 Processor
description: Introducing the all-new 10th Generation Intel Core i7 10700 processor, Unlocked 10th Gen Intel Core desktop processors are optimized for enthusiast gamers, overclockers, and serious content creators looking to take advantage of amazing overclocking and unleash the performance capabilities of these new processors. With an optimal balance of frequency, cores and threads, advanced tuning support, and blazing connectivity unlocked 10th Gen Intel Core processors supercharge desktops for a competitive edge.Intel 10th Generation Core i7-10700 Processor having the base frequency of 2.90 GHz that can be reached as max turbo frequency at 4.80 GHz. It has the SmartCache of 12 MB containing 8 cores and 16 threads. With the bus speed of 8 GT/s DMI3, it has integrated Intel UHD Graphics 630. This internal graphics has 350 MHz of base & 1.20 GHz of max dynamic frequency and 64 GB of video max memory. Considering the memory this processor has dual-channel of max 128GB of the size that supports up to DDR4-2666 bus speed. Experience amazing gameplay and creativity with Intelâ€™s supported platform features. Get more from your PC build by untethering with Intel Wi-Fi 6 (Gig+), versatile connectivity with Thunderbolt 3, and accelerated responsiveness with Intel Optane memory. Whether youâ€™re looking to fully experience the latest games and entertainment or boost your productivity when creating or running the latest business productivity apps, Intelâ€™s newest lineup of desktop processors delivers powerful features that empower you to do more.

name: Intel 12th Gen Core i7-12700 Alder Lake Processor
description: the Intel Core i7-12700 Alder Lake CPU will feature both DDR5 and DDR4 memory controllers. High-end motherboards will retain DDR5 while the more mainstream offerings will open up DDR4 support too. This 12th Gen Core i7 comes with Mobo Socket LGA 1700, 64 Bit Width, 2 Memory Channels with Maximum memory 256 GB capacity, it has thermal design power (TDP) rating of 125W. This Core i7 12th Gen processor has few expansion options also.The Core i7-12700 comes with two more early benchmark appearances. For reference, the Core i7-12700 is a 12-core processor with 8 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores. Intel will announce its Alder Lake-S desktop processor family next week, with an official launch shortly, According to previous reports. The Latest Intel 12th Gen i7-12700 comes with 03 years warranty (No Warranty for Fan or Cooler).

name: Lexar 8GB DDR4 2666 Mhz UDIMM Desktop RAM
description: Lexar 8GB DDR4 2666 Mhz Desktop RAM lets you wake up your PC with a performance upgrade that gives you faster bootups, increased responsiveness, and faster application load times. With its simple setup, you'll be up and running in no time, so you can multitask with ease. Applications that process a lot of data shouldn't ever make you less responsive. Therefore, Lexar DDR4 RAM gives you the performance increase to multitask with ease whether you're browsing the internet, using spreadsheets, or uploading images. The Lexar 8GB DDR4 2666 Mhz Desktop RAM comes with a lifetime warranty.

name: CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RS 8GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM
description: The CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RS 8GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM features individually addressable RGB lighting while delivering outstanding performance optimized for Intel and AMD motherboards. It is compatible with Intel 300 Series, Intel 400 Series, Intel 500 Series, Intel 600 Series, AMD 300 Series, AMD 400 Series, AMD 500 Series. Illuminate your system with dynamic RGB lighting from six individually addressable RGB LEDs, encased in a panoramic light pipe that offers unobstructed viewing from virtually every angle. It features a beautifully designed aluminum heat spreader that conducts heat away from your memory for superb cooling even when overclocked, with modern styling to complement your RGB lighting. It has been engineered for performance with a custom high-performance PCB and carefully screened memory chips deliver maximum bandwidth and tight response times. The CORSAIR VENGEANCE RGB RS comes with a lifetime warranty.

name: G.Skill Trident Z 8GB DDR4 3200MHz Desktop RAM
description: Building on the strong success of G.SKILL Trident series, Trident Z series represents one of the worldâ€™s highest performance DDR4 memory designed for overclocking enthusiasts and extreme gamers. Building on the strong success of G.SKILL Trident series, Trident Z series represents one of the world's highest performance DDR4 memory designed for PC enthusiasts and extreme gamers. Using only the best-in-class components and featuring luxurious hair-line finish aluminum heat-spreaders, Trident Z series is the state-of-the-art DDR4 solution that combines performance and beauty for PC enthusiasts and extreme overclockers to build an ultra-fast PC or achieve new overclocking records. Designed for PC enthusiasts, overclockers, and extreme gamers, the Trident Z series DDR4 is built with specially screened ICs qualified under the legendary G.SKILL selection process, and rigorously tested for reliability, compatibility, and performance across a wide range of motherboards. Built for the highest performance, G.SKILL Trident Z series memory is the world's first to bring DDR4 4000MHz to XMP rated speed on the first launch, as well as the world's first memory to break the DDR4-5000MHz overclocking world record barrier. Trident Z series maintains the aggressive fin design for highly efficient heat dissipation, while introducing luxurious hair-line finish aluminum heat-spreaders. Look no further for a memory that combines performance and beauty for building a stylish, modern PC! No compromises! These extreme speed memory kits not only come in kits of 4GB and 8GB modules; a series of ultra high speed 16GB modules are also available in Trident Z series. Build your dream supercomputer with up to DDR4 128GB (16GBx8) of ultra-capacity at ultra-high frequencies! All Trident Z DDR4 memory kits are tested with G.SKILL's rigorous validation process on major performance motherboard brands to ensure the best-in-class reliability and compatibility across the widest selection of motherboards. Just set and go. Programmed with the latest Intel XMP 2.0 profiles, the only thing between you and extreme performance is a simple setting.

name: TEAM DELTA UD 8GB 2666MHz RGB DDR4 Desktop RAM
description: TEAMGROUP T-FORCE gaming series once again released the all-new luminous memory module â€“ DELTA RGB. The R on the heat spreader represents Revolution, and also stands for a creative concept with an uncompromised spirit. The heat spreader is built with a lighter, thinner, and high-quality metal material. The colorful light changes make the hollow on the front even more stereoscopic and echo the ultra-wide angle luminous area. The extraordinary Revolution will provide players with a new experience never seen before. DELTA RGB is using full color, dazzling RGB LED lighting with a force flow effect. Like a Jedi holding a lightsaber, players can be invincible in the gaming world. T-FORCE LOGO is like a warriorâ€™s badge, standing still in the changing lights. The full frame, 120Â° ultra wide angle luminous area at the top emits colorful bright light. The color of the light changes smoothly to provide players with an unparalleled visual feast, no matter whether it is day or night. The one-piece, geometric line design makes the heat spreader looks simple but energetic, and the Cubist style in the new art movement is also presented, which is a perfect combination of technology and aesthetics. The embossed lines on the surface not only increase the heat dissipation area and also effectively enhance the cooling of the memory module, so the quality of the operation can be finely stabilized. T-FORCE DELTA RGB offers full-color, variable, synchronized lighting. The lighting and synchronization can be controlled by the T-FORCE BLITZ (beta version). Besides, you can express yourself by customizing your lighting display. No matter which you choose, it is sure to look cool. T-FORCE DELTA RGB memory module supports ASUS Aura Sync / GIGABYTE RGB Fusion / MSI Mystic Light Sync / ASROCK-Polychrome Sync/TT RGB Plus/RAZER CHROMA software. This lightning-controlled software allows gamers to control lighting effects and lighting synchronization with T-FORCE DELTA RGB luminous memory module. It creates a unique, dazzling color aesthetics and offers a brilliant RGB system! Using the latest customized JEDEC RC 2.0 circuit board to increase the distance between the power layer and the signal layer. Compared to ordinary memories, the transmitting signal is raised by 35%. There will be no interference between the power and the signal and gets better performance. It completely releases the transmission of the memory module and offers players the ultimate sensation of overclocking and a highly stable overclocking memory module. With a low working voltage of 1.2~1.4V from DDR4 DELTA RGB, it is not only energy saving but can also reduce the temperature and the heat generated to offer the high-speed running memory a stable and long time operation.

name: Corsair DOMINATOR PLATINUM RGB 8GB DDR4 3600MHz C18 RAM
description: DOMINATOR PLATINUM RGB 8GB DDR4 3600MHz C18 RAM from Corsair Premium memory is created using a mix of precision die-casting and anodization. Each module has 12 ultra-bright RGB LEDs. 12 individually controllable RGB LEDs provide magnificent customizable illumination for your PC. DHX Cooling Technology is a one-of-a-kind dual-channel cooling system. DOMINATOR PLATINUM RGB stays cool even under intense duress thanks to a heat spreader incorporated directly into the PCB that draws heat away from the modules. High-speed and precise timing Hand-sorted carefully screened memory chips deliver high-frequency performance and fast reaction times, with enough opportunity for overclocking. Signal quality and stability are guaranteed with a custom high-performance PCB for enhanced overclocking. Unlimited Possibilities, Intelligent Control The CORSAIR iCUE software brings your system to life with dynamic RGB lighting control that is synchronized across all of your iCUE-compatible products, as well as real-time temperature and frequency monitoring. The Corsair DOMINATOR PLATINUM RGB 8GB DDR4 3600MHz C18 RAM comes with a lifetime warranty.

name: Corsair RM1200x SHIFT 1200W 80 PLUS Gold Fully Modular ATX Power Supply
description: The Corsair RM1200x SHIFT 1200W Fully Modular Power Supply has a novel side cable interface that keeps all of your connections within easy reach, resulting in extraordinarily convenient 80 PLUS Gold efficiency. RMx SHIFT simplifies clean PC builds and upgrades with completely modular micro-fit connectors and ATX 3.0 compatibility. RMx SHIFT power supplies feature Japanese 105°C-rated electrolytic capacitors for extended life and durability, which are supported by a ten-year guarantee. A 140mm fluid dynamic bearing fan employs a precisely designed fan curve for maximum performance and dependability while producing little noise, and Zero RPM mode support provides almost silent operation at low and medium loads. Put an RMx SHIFT Series PSU on your side for quiet, efficient, and easily available power.

name: ASUS ROG THOR 850P 80+ Platinum Power Supply
description: The ROG Thor 850W Platinum Power Supply Unit is the firs PSU launched by ASUS and it is packed with innovative ideas. It stands out with Aura Sync and an OLED display. ASUS Aura Sync is an illumination ecosystem that lets you synchronize lighting effects across your gaming rig, components, and peripherals. The ROG Thor lets you take full control with internal Aura RGB LEDs that connect to the 4-1 addressable RGB header on select motherboards. It is the first PC PSU in the world to feature an integrated OLED panel, offering a real-time display of power draw. Now you can see at a glance how much juice your rig is using. It has been equipped with a 135mm patented Wing-blade fan to maximize component lifespan. IP5X dust-resistance keeps it spinning freely and 0dB technology utilizes thermal sensors to allow the fan to switch off completely at lower wattages. The integrated ROG heatsinks have 2x more volume than traditional designs, resulting in 20% lower temperatures inside the ROG Thor 850W Platinum. It has an 80+ Platinum certification for energy efficiency, built with 100% Japanese capacitors for stability and durability. The sleeved cables include one 24-pin, two 6+2-pin PCI-e cables, and two 8-pin CPU cables. It ensures reliability and comes with a 10-year warranty.

name: ASUS ROG THOR 1200P2 GAMING 80 Plus Platinum 1200W Power Supply
description: The inbuilt OLED monitor in the ROG Thor 1200P Platinum Power Supply Unit provides a real-time display of power consumption. Now you can easily check how much electricity your apparatus is using. To improve component lifespan, the ROG Thor 1200W Platinum has a 135mm unique Wing-blade fan. The fan is kept spinning freely thanks to IP5X dust protection, and 0dB technology makes use of thermal sensors to enable the fan to entirely shut off at lower wattages for absolutely silent operation. The integrated ROG heatsinks are 20% cooler inside the ROG Thor 1200W Platinum thanks to their 2x larger capacity than conventional designs. As a result, components last longer and can operate at 0dB for longer than in conventional designs. Given how efficient the heatsinks are, the fan

name: Cooler Master MWE 550 550W Full Modular 80 Plus Gold Certified Power Supply
description: The MWE delivers everything you expect from top tier power supply at a budget price.This unit also comes with a circuit design that will protect your system at all times.The 120mm fan keeps your system cool with little noise. This tough little box is the perfect solution for all your power needs. with Active Power Factor Correction design and forward topology.Meeting the 80 PLUS certification for 230V, the MWE will guarantee a typical efficiency of at least 85% during normal use. The MWE is designed to the latest envirmental regulations and standards, meeting the ErP 2013 mandates. The MWE consumes less then 0.5 Watt when your system is in standby mode, which not only reduces strain on the environment but also your energy bill. The MWE is engineered to operate normally at up to 40Â°C, providing added security and reliability to systems operating in warmer environments. The thermally controlled 120mm HDB fan operates smoothly without friction.Enjoy your system with a durable fan in a quiet environment. The MWE provides you full standard protection (OCP/OVP/UVP/SCP/OPP) plus built-in Over Temperature Protection (OTP). These extra security measures minimize the risk of damage to your system from power outages.This power supply comes with 03 years of warranty service.

name: Cooler Master MWE 750W Fully Modular 80 PLUS Gold Certified Power Supply
description: Cooler Master MWE 750W Power Supply comes with fully modular MWE 80 PLUS Gold Certified. This MWE 750W power supply unit delivers consistent 90% efficiency, low temperatures, and quiet operation. In this power supply, High quality, heat resistant components have been used to achieve gold level performance at temperatures up to 45Â°C. The power supply also features with Input Voltage 100-240V, Input Current 6.3A, Input Frequency 50-60Hz with MB 24 Pin 1, CPU 12V 4+4 Pin 1, SATA 8, Peripheral 4 Pin 3, FDD Cable 4 Pin 1, PCI-e 6+2 Pin 2 Connector and Fan Size 120mm, Fan Bearing LDB. Here the Silencio fan and exclusive LDB bearing provides nearly silent cooling at no loss to system performance and a longer lifespan. The power supply is 80 PLUS Gold Certified, and this certification guarantees a typical efficiency of 90% under normal operating conditions. The Fully customizable cabling reduces clutter, increases airflow and improves overall thermal performance. The Flat cables improve airflow by reducing cable bulk and a single +12V line ensures all components are fed the same stable output regardless of which cable you use. Be bold, power with gold. The MWE 750W 80 PLUS Gold power supply comes with 05 years of warranty. MWE GOLD 750 FULLY MODULAR

features.name: Model
features.detail: MWE 750W Fully Modular 80 PLUS Gold Certified

name: LG 32EP950-B 32 Inch UltraFine OLED Pro 4K Professional Monitor
description: LG 32EP950-B 32-inch 4K Monitor is an excellent choice for professional video editors and content creators. The LG 32EP950-B is a 4K supported OLED Monitor with a 60Hz refresh rate.This monitor is specially designed for visual tech. Apart from master-grade picture quality this 32-inch 4K OLED Monitor has Pixel Dimming Technology and a stunning 1M: 1 Contrast Ratio. This monitor performs very well when exact color reproduction is Intended. The typical DCI-P3 reading is 99% with an Adobe RGB reading of 99% This Monitor also supports some special features. It comes with hardware Calibration and this monitor is a perfect fit for an optimized Workstation for Visual Tech or Graphics designers. This Monitor Supports Multi-Interface. 32 4K OLED Display has a USB Type-C port. But the most notable aspect of this Monitor is centered around generating accurate Contrast and Colors for Professionals. This Monitor Also supports OLED Pixel Dimming HDR tech. It means the self-light-emitting pixels of the LG UltraFine OLED Pro allows incredibly accurate image display. At the same time, the Pixel Dimming technology adjusts individual pixels to adjust and express the perfect contrast. As told before this OLED Monitor has a 1M: 1 Contrast Ratio. With This high contrast ratio, almost all colors and visuals that creators or editors intended can be presented precisely. For Wide and Accurate Color Reproduction The LG UltraFine OLED Pro uses the industry-standard DCI-P3 99% and Adobe RGB 99% Color gamuts. This wide range of color gamut enables the monitor to sufficiently reproduce color areas of multiple standards and accurately represent the exact computed color values that film directors use. Commercial high-end cinema cameras usually support DCI-P3, and it is the basic color profile for cinema & VFX content. And most photo studios trust and use the Adobe sRGB color profile - improving upon the gamut of the sRGB color space. It supports true 10-bit color and it can reproduce more than a billion colors. Various Color Mode Support Standard Color Modes for Professionals. It features a Hardware Calibration allowing the monitor to enhance its color accuracy. So you can stably work with the same color environment even using other PC or devices. It has a fresh rate of 60 Hz. The supported HDR signals are BT.2100. it is the broadcast standard for HDR TV) PQ / P3 PQ which offers benefits to film and video editors. LG 32EP950-B 32 Inch UltraFine OLED Pro 4K Monitor offers 03 years of warranty.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5 UHD 4K HDR 138Hz OLED Gaming Monitor
description: The ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5 UHD 4K OLED Monitor provides fully immersive gaming and entertainment experiences. This huge display is built for performance, with a 3840 x 2160 4K UHD resolution OLED HDR panel and a 1,500,000:1 peak contrast ratio, offering breathtaking pictures with deep shadows and highlights. Furthermore, its 138 Hz overclocked refresh rate and 0.1 ms reaction time aid in reducing motion blur from quick action sequences. With compatible graphics cards, NVIDIA G-Sync compatibility decreases screen tearing, stuttering, and other abnormalities. The ROG Swift PG42UQ is also an excellent display for making professional-quality films, photographs, and other content, thanks to its high performance.Exceptional Color The display of the ASUS ROG Swift PG42UQ 41.5 UHD 4K OLED Gaming Monitor is factory calibrated and supports 10-bit color with Delta 2 accuracies, supporting 98% of the DCI-P3 and 133% of the sRGB gamuts. True-to-life photos with dazzling highlights and deep shadows are delivered by High-Dynamic range support, which has a maximum contrast ratio of 1,500,000:1. The brightness is similarly 450 nits, with selectable adjustments to maintain uniformity throughout the screen.

name: ASUS ProArt PA32UCR-K 32 Professional 4K Monitor
description: The ProArt PA32UCRK 32 4K HDR Monitor from ASUS is intended for creative professionals and is factory calibrated to offer an E1 color accuracy certification. This 4K monitor's 3840 x 2160 resolution with 100% sRGB, 99.5% Adobe RGB, 98% DCI-P3 and 87% Rec.2020 color coverage aid in streamlining creative operations. With the aid of HDR preview mode, you may edit content intended for broadcast and television thanks to exclusive ASUS Smart HDR technology. Users may examine several color spaces with different ProArt Presets and change colors as necessary based on their workflow. You may use HDMI, USB Type-C (DisplayPort Alt Mode), and DisplayPort connections to connect the ProArt PA32UCRK to your computer. With compatible laptops, you may send data, video, music, and up to 80W of power via a single USB Type-C cable. A three-port USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A hub and inbuilt 2W stereo speakers are further features. The ASUS ProArt PA32UCR-K Professional Monitor comes with a 03-Year warranty.

name: TEAM MP34Q 4TB M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD
description: The MP34 high-speed solid-state drive from TEAMGROUP supports the new generation of PCIe Gen3 x4 high-speed interface and the latest NVMe1.3 protocol. The superior performance allows sequential read/write speed to reach up to 3400/2000 MB/s. It is much more efficient for booting, loading games, or large file transferring. The MP34 M.2 PCIe SSD delivers the finest, smoothest gaming experience and an extremely high-speed performance without any lag

name: Seagate IronWolf 125 2TB 2.5-inch SATA III SSD
description: The Seagate IronWolf 125 2TB 2.5-inch SATA III SSD is designed for demanding workloads and multi-user NAS settings, and it provides powerhouse performance with 24/7, always-on capabilities. This 2TB SSD is compatible with Windows 10, 8.1, and Unix and features a SATA III 6 Gb/s interface, a 2.s / 7mm form factor, sustained sequential read rates of up to 560 MB/s, and sustained sequential write speeds of up to 540 MB/s. It's IronWolf 125 SSD also boasts an MTBF rating of 1.8 million hours, 1 in 1017 non-recoverable read errors per bit read, a Total Bytes Written (TBW) capacity of up to 700TB, and 3D TLC NAND flash memory.

name: Team T-CREATE CLASSIC M.2 NVMe PCIe Gen4x4 2TB SSD
description: The T-CREATE CLASSIC PCIe 4.0 SSD features a classic design that never goes out of style. It has been tailored for the considerable amount of multi-tasking required in creative production, it is beautiful both inside and out, a timeless classic for creating new wonders. It supports the latest M.2 PCIe Gen4x4 high-performance interface, it can read and write up to 5000/4400 Mb/s and performs 40% faster than Gen3x4 solid-state drives, delivering a faster and smoother graphics-intensive rendering experience, and greatly reducing conversion wait time. It combines one of the most reliable controllers on the market with customized stable firmware to create the best high-stability SSD, taking care of your precious work. Using a specially selected, rigorously tested 3D TLC flash chip, it provides the best operation and storage solution for your system, giving you free reign to unleash your creative power. It supports intelligent algorithms and high-rate LDPC (Low-Density Parity Check) ECC functionality that ensures data safety and integrity in your work. The excellent quality of the T-CREATE CLASSIC PCIe 4.0 SSD makes it the best choice for creators at work. It comes with a 5-year warranty.

name: MSI SPATIUM M470 2TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD
description: The MSI SPATIUM M470 2TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD comes with a sequential read/write speed of up to 5000/4400 MB/s. Take your system to the next level with SPATIUM M470 2TB SSD. It has a PCIe Gen4x4 interface and complies with the NVMe 1.3 standard. The latest 3D NAND flash technology brings dense storage in a compact design. It features built-in data security and error-correction capabilities that extend the endurance and longevity of the NAND flash storage. It supports Trim, S.M.A.R.T., LDPC ECC, and E2E Data Protection. The MSI SPATIUM M470 is suitable for both desktops and notebooks. It delivers blazing speeds and incredible performance. Take your system to the next level with SPATIUM. The M470 comes with 5 years of warranty.

name: GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24GB GDDR6X Graphics Card
description: The GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G Graphics Card is integrated with a 24GB GDDR6X 384-bit memory interface and it features NVIDIA Ada Lovelace Streaming Multiprocessors. It is equipped with advanced 4th Generation Tensor Cores for up to 2X AI performance and 3rd Generation RT Cores for up to 2X ray tracing performance. GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G is equipped with some special features such as a WINDFORCE cooling system, LCD Edge View, RGB Fusion 2.0, 4 video outputs, and a Protection metal backplate. The WINDFORCE cooling system features three 110mm newly designed bionic shark fans, alternate spinning, 13 composite copper heat pipes, a large vapor chamber directly touching the GPU, 3D active fans, and Screen cooling, which together provide high-efficiency heat dissipation. The double ball bearing structure has better heat endurance and efficiency than the sleeve structure. The 3D Active Fan provides semi-passive cooling, and the fans will remain off when the GPU is in a low load or low power game. The LCD monitor of the GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G Graphics Card not only displays graphics card information, but also various favorite texts, pictures, and GIFs. The legendary three-ring lighting provides excellent visual enjoyment. You can choose any lighting effect or synchronize it with other devices in the GIGABYTE CONTROL CENTER. The GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G Graphics Card features Dual Bios. The factory default setting is OC mode, which provides users with the best performance. However, switching to silent mode will enjoy a quieter experience. The metal back plate not only provides an aesthetical shape but also enhances the structure of the graphics card to provide complete protection. GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24GB features the new anti-sag bracket tailored to each graphics card. It provides optimized reinforcement and a better overall visual appearance. The GIGABYTE AORUS GeForce RTX 4090 MASTER 24G comes with 3 years of warranty.

name: Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 3090 Ti AMP Extreme Holo 24GB GDDR6X Graphics Card
description: The Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 3090 Ti AMP Extreme Holo 24GB GDDR6X Graphics Card is based on the NVIDIA Ampere architecture. Built with enhanced RT Cores and Tensor Cores, new streaming multiprocessors, and superfast GDDR6X memory, the Zotac Gaming GeForce RTX 3090 Ti AMP Extreme Holo gives rise to an amplified gaming experience with ultragraphic fidelity. It features 2nd Gen Ray Tracing Cores and 3rd Gen Tensor Cores. It comes with SPECTRA 2.0 RGB lighting. It enables beautiful colors, brings lighting to life with animated options, and makes the graphics card yours with personalization using the ZOTAC GAMING FireStorm software. It is powered by IceStorm 2.0 Advanced Cooling, and it offers Active Fan Control with FREEZE Fan Stop. It has a metal front panel and an RGB LED back panel. It has 3 x DisplayPort 1.4a (up to 7680x4320 @60Hz), HDMI 2.1 (up to 7680x4320 @60Hz). An Ultra High-Speed HDMI Cable is required to support 8K at 60 frames per second or 4K at 120 frames per second. It is NVIDIA NVLink (SLI-ready) and VR-ready. It is compatible with Windows 10 64-bit. A 750-watt power supply is recommended for this graphics card. It has 3 years standard warranty + 2 years will Extend after online registration by customer within 28 days of Purchase Total warranty: 5 years.

features.name: Model
features.detail: GeForce RTX 3090 Ti AMP Extreme Holo

name: ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 3090 OC Edition 24GB GDDR6X Graphics Card
description: SUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 3090 OC Edition Graphics Card features NVIDIA Ampere Streaming Multiprocessors: The building blocks for the worldâ€™s fastest, most efficient GPU, the all-new Ampere SM brings 2X the FP32 throughput and improved power efficiency. It comes with 2nd Generation RT Cores: Experience 2X the throughput of 1st gen RT Cores, plus concurrent RT and shading for a whole new level of ray tracing performance. It also has 3rd Generation Tensor Cores: Get up to 2X the throughput with structural sparsity and advanced AI algorithms such as DLSS. Now with support for up to 8K resolution, these cores deliver a massive boost in-game performance and all-new AI capabilities. A new all-metal shroud houses three powerful axial-tech fans that utilize durable dual ball fan bearings. Fan rotation has been optimized for reduced turbulence, and a stop mode brings all three fans to a halt at low temps. Beneath, independent heatsinks for the GPU and memory keep thermals under tight control. Additional features, including TUF components, Auto-Extreme Technology, a new GPU bracket, and a backplate vent make the TUF a proper powerhouse. Axial-tech fan design, with three fans working in tandem to satisfy the thermal demands of NVIDIA's new high-octane design. The fans rely on dual ball fan bearings to ensure consistent performance and increased longevity compared to sleeve bearings and other bearing types. Dual Ball Fan Bearings can last up to twice as long as a sleeve bearing designs. The two fans spin counterclockwise to reduce turbulence. and to eliminate unnecessary noise, a stop mode halts all fans when the GPU temp falls below 50 degrees and power consumption is low. The heat spreader draws heat up into heat pipes that carry it through a fin stack that fills most of the card's large, 2.7-slot footprint. Military-grade Capacitors and other TUF components enhance durability and performance. An all-aluminium shroud adds robust protection to TUF Gaming graphics cards and a no-nonsense industrial design and grayscale colourway fits into any build with ease. The top-side RGB element can be customized to display a range of aesthetic and functional effects and also synced with other ASUS components to enable uniform lighting. The ASUS GPU Tweak II utility takes graphics card tuning to the next level. It allows you to tweak critical parameters including GPU core clocks, memory frequency, and voltage settings, with the option to monitor everything in real-time through a customizable on-screen display. Advanced fan control is also included along with many more features to help you get the most out of your graphics card. ASUS TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 3090 OC Edition 24GB GDDR6X Graphics Card has 3 years warranty.

features.detail: TUF Gaming GeForce RTX 3090 OC Edition

name: ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 4090 Trinity 24GB GDDR6X Graphics Card
description: The ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 4090 Trinity 24G features a strong graphics processor and very fast GDDR6X graphics memory. The gaming graphics card is designed for gamers who have high expectations for graphic quality and performance. The processing speed of the rasterization optics and the ray tracing performance have been greatly boosted as compared to the RTX 3090 series. Furthermore, the Ada generation graphics accelerators support PCI Express 4.0. Extremely high frame rates in 4K and even smooth gameplay in 8K are achievable with a GeForce RTX 4090. The ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 4090 Trinity 24G has great graphics performance. The graphics processor, with a maximum boost rate of 2,520 MHz, and the 24 GB of GDDR6X memory, with an effective clock frequency of 21,000 MHz, assure this. The ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 4090 Trinity 24G is kept cool by a triple-fan cooling system built by ZOTAC. The graphics card is approximately 35.6 cm long and 3.5 slots high. The ZOTAC GAMING GeForce RTX 4090 Trinity 24GB Graphics Card comes with3 years standard warranty + 2 years will Extend after online registration by customer within 28 days of Purchase Total warranty: 5 years.
